required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of the Effectiveness and Safety of Darunavir/Cobicistat (DRV/c) Containing Regimens in Routine Clinical Practice
clinical_study.official_title: Multicenter Retrospective Study of the Effectiveness and Safety of Darunavir/Cobicistat (DRV/c) Containing Regimens in Routine Clinical Practice

brief_summary.textblock: This is a retrospective observational study of patients who have taken a regimen containing DRV / c at least 24 weeks prior to study initiation

detailed_description.textblock: The study will include 750 patients and will record data at 24 weeks. The study will also record data at 48 weeks for those patients whom these data are available

primary_outcome.measure: Virological effectiveness data: Percentage of patients with undetectable viral load
primary_outcome.description: Virological effectiveness data at 24 weeks: Percentage of patients with undetectable viral load, defined as HIV RNA <50 copies / m.

primary_outcome.measure: Virological effectiveness data: change in the number of CD4 + T cells at 24 weeks
primary_outcome.description: Change in the number of CD4 + T cells at 24 weeks

primary_outcome.measure: Virological effectiveness data: time to loss of virological efficacy.
primary_outcome.description: Defined virological failure as two consecutive levels of HIV RNA > 50 copies / mL or single HIV RNA ≥ 500 copies / mL

secondary_outcome.measure: Virological effectiveness data: Percentage of patients with undetectable viral load, defined as HIV RNA levels ≤ 50 copies / mL or limit of detection of the center, at 48 weeks
Virological effectiveness data: change in the number of CD4 + T cells, at 48 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Virological effectiveness data at 48 weeks: change in the number of CD4 + T cells

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in the renal profile: Comparison of mean values of Creatinine and eFG (CKD-EPI).
Changes in the lipid profile: Comparison of mean values of total cholesterol values, Col LDL, Col HDL and TG.
Changes in the hepatic profile: comparison of mean values of GOT, GPT, FA, GGT and BrT
secondary_outcome.description: GOT, GPT, FA, GGT in units: UI/l or μKat/l or mU/ml. BrT in units: mg/dl or micromol/l

secondary_outcome.measure: Tolerability data:Rate of patients discontinuing treatment for toxicity.
secondary_outcome.description: Toxicity to the treatment or virological failure

secondary_outcome.measure: Tolerability data: Rate of patients discontinuing treatment for virological failure at 24 weeks / 48 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Virological failure defined as two consecutive levels of HIV RNA > 50 copies / mL or single HIV RNA ≥ 500 copies / mL

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of patients who develop any adverse effects:frequency of adverse events,frequency of serious adverse events, frequency of adverse events leading to discontinuation of treatment, number of deaths and frequency of laboratory abnormalities.

Representative subgroups of patients according to the treatment that patient is taking: Percentage of patients with different Darunavir/cobicistat based regimens (Monotherapy, Bitherapy, triple Therapy, others)
Provenance treatments: Percentage of patients with different prior therapies (Darunavir Therapy, Other PI therapies, NNRTI based regimen, INI bases regimen

Reason for the change prior the initiation:Percentage of patients with each main reason to change to a DRV/c based regimen (first regimen, simplification, intolerance or toxicity, prior adherence problems, prior interactions, prior failure, others)

arm_group.description: Patients starting treatment with a regimen containing Darunavir / cobicistat for at least 24 weeks

study_pop.textblock: HIV patients that initiated treatment with a régimen containing DRV/c at least 24 weeks prior initiation of study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with HIV infection
- Inform consent document.
- To have initiated therapy containing DRV / c and have a follow-up of at least 24 Weeks.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Not having evaluable clinical data of the patient
- Patients not routinely followed in the center
- Patient less than 18 years of age.

facility.name: Hospital de la Santa Creu i Sant Pau
